events.name: MLDM Monday｜用開放資料玩出政府創新應用 : 當雨神來臨時...

group.name: Taiwan R User Group / MLDM Monday

events.description:
[講者]
Kristen , R-Ladies Taipei Co-organizer

[講題摘要]
極端氣候、氣候變遷使得短延時強降雨日漸頻繁，本次分享將探討目前台灣有哪些資料可以來協助並降低大雨來的災害，而大雨所發生的水患就交給大雨來智水吧！

events.name: MLDM Monday｜Domain Adaptation 的數學理論推導

group.name: Taiwan R User Group / MLDM Monday

events.description:
主題：Domain Adaptation 的數學理論推導

摘要：
機器學習在實務上常會需要解決 Domain Adaptation 的問題，也就是說，訓練模型所使用的資料，和實際上模型要預測的資料，它們的分佈是不一樣的。近年來（2014~）有相關多的研究，針對 Domain Adaptation 的應用情境提出很多解決方式，但其基本的數學原理仍然大同小異。本次演講會針對 Domain Adaptation 的數學理論做比較詳細的介紹，主要會參考這篇論文：

>https://www.alexkulesza.com/pubs/adapt_mlj10.pdf

講者介紹：
Mark Chang
人工智慧及數學的愛好者，喜歡從數學理論的角度來切入人工智慧的研究。

events.name: SDN x Cloud Native Meetup #19

venue.name: 天瓏書局-電腦書專賣店

events.description:
本次 SDN x Cloud Native Meetup 將有很牛的 ONF Staff 透過遠端來帶我們再次溫習 Kubernetes 網路功能與實現; 如果牛牛遠端感受不到他在 ONF 的氣場沒關係，我們現場有 ONF 大使將與您討論 SDN 及 Cloud 技術如何帶動 Access Network 的發展; 如果網路相關還聽不夠爽沒關係，我們還有邀請到 A10 Networks 技術經理來探討 DevOps 團隊在現實層面可能面臨的網路相關挑戰; 最後也特別邀請到 LINE Taiwan 全方位實習生分享如何透過 Rancher Pipeline 與 Kubernetes 進行大流量服務部署。

P.S. 由於場地是天瓏書局 Coding Space 合作提供，因此需收每人 100 NTD 來支持天瓏書局，有興趣朋友也可以在現場拿取折價卷，並購買書唷。
========================== 流程 / Agenda =========================
13:20 - 13:30 報到
13:30 - 13:40 開場
13:40 - 14:20 Talk 1
14:20 - 14:30 休息/ 交流
14:30 - 15:10 Talk 2
15:10 - 15:20 休息/ 交流
15:20 - 16:00 Talk 3
16:00 - 16:20 休息/ 交流
16:20 - 17:00 Talk 4
17:00 - 18:00 小飛機與你有約(蕉流時間)
======================= 議程內容 / Sessions =======================
Talk 1: 牛牛帶你了解 Kubernetes 網路功能與原理

Kubernetes 內資源的網路存取一直以來都是非常重要的核心功能，Service 與 Ingress 的支援更是提供了方便與好用的功能，這次想要跟大家重新溫習一下 Kubernetes 內相關網路功能的實現，同時也介紹各種 Kubernetes 內負載平衡的機制，並且談談從 Layer 4 到 Layer 7 不同應用的情況下，要如何在 Kubernetes 享受到負載平衡的效果。

Speaker: HUNG-WEI CHIU (HWCHIU)
一位喜好研究各式各樣網路概念的平凡人， CNTUG/SDNDS-TW 台灣本地社群的共同維護人。目前人在美國於 ONF (Open Networking Foundation) 組織擔任 Staff Member。
=================================================================
Talk 2: Enhanced Security & Visibility in Microservice Based Architecture

探討 DevOps 團隊在現實層面可能面臨的挑戰，例如：

- 基於微服務架構中的延遲問題
- 針對東西向/南北向網路流量的單一管理平台
- 跨雲端環境部署的 4-7 層流量可視化分析

Speaker: 陳志緯(Nick Chen)
陳志緯於2012年加入 A10 Networks，目前擔任台灣區技術經理，主要負責電信及遊戲產業解決方案與技術支援。在 IT 產業有 15 年的經驗橫跨應用軟體開發、資訊安全與網路建置規劃。
=================================================================
Talk 3: How SDN and Cloud Native Drive Access Network

本議程帶大家討論SDN及Cloud技術如何帶動 Access Network 的發展, 用較為簡單易懂的方式讓大家對於Broadband access及Mobile Access有更多的了解, 並帶大家討論現在的營運商, 電信商都在討論些什麼:

- Broadband Access Network
- Mobile Access Network
- Multi-access Edge Computing

Speaker: 陳建豪 (JianHao Chen)
- Edgecore Pre-sales Sr. Engineer
- ONF A-team member
=================================================================
Talk 4: Rancher Pipeline 以及 Kubenetes 在大流量服務的部署經驗

在本場 Meetup 中, Wei 會介紹如何使用 Rancher 自建K8s, 整合 Drone, Kustomize, Argo 等 CI/CD 工具幫助團隊改善原本需要工程師手動操作的部署流程，最後會以專案實例展現 K8s 是如何被運用在 LINE 的大流量服務。

- 為甚麼要使用 Kubernetes
- Kubernetes with Rancher
- Kubernetes 與 CI/CD工具整合
- Kubernetes 使用案例

Speaker: 萬俊瑋(Wei Wan)
LINE Taiwan 實習生，同時在多重案子壓榨下成長的全方位工程師。負責 LINE Music SRE, LINE Today MRT 等多項一天流量高達百萬 PV 專案。
==================== 主辦單位 / The organizer ====================
Cloud Native Taiwan User Group 希望整合台灣雲端相關社群如 OpenStack, Kubernetes, Ceph, SDN 等，並利用 Meetup 定期在各台灣地區舉辦技術與推廣分享活動。目的是藉此群策群力來使該社團快速成長，以對台灣在雲端開源平台的貢獻，另外我們更希望該社群持有 Cloud Native 概念，並將此推廣至台灣企業、學校、政府單位等。更多資訊，請到

>https: //fb.cloudnative.tw/ FB 社群關注。

Software Defined Network Develop Society TW (SDNDS-TW) 是由一群熱愛研究 SDN 相關領域的夥伴們成立的交流社團，在此社團內會交流眾多主題，從學界的學習研究到最新業界的發展與現況。社團內亦有多位 SDN 領域相關的開源貢獻者，期許透過交流能夠促進`SDN`在台灣業界/學界有更進一步的成長以及對該領域的貢獻。更多資訊，請到

1.如果你是新手那麼你可以把你的問題帶過來跟與會的朋友討論（問題最好切成各個小問題，太大的問題3個小時的聚會時間沒有辦法解決）

2.如果你是熟手那麼你可以跟高手討教關於架構的問題或是記憶體管理的問題，新東西等等，也可以幫助在場的新手朋友們。

3.如果你是高手那麼你可以到場提升大家的能力，找尋合作夥伴，炫技等等。

如果你只是想過來聊聊也很歡迎！

可以到場coding、聊天、把工作帶過來做。

events.name: #21 Global AI Night
events.description:
The Global AI Night is a free evening event organized by 92 communities all over the world that are passionate about Artificial Intelligence on the Microsoft Azure.

• What we'll do
19:15 - 19:30 Connecting with people
19:30 - 20:10 No code using Azure Machine Learning Visual Interface - Money Yu、Kristen Chan
20:15 - 21:15 人臉辨識之真實戰經驗 - 小白
21:15 - Connecting and See you

• What to bring
• 人臉辨識之真實戰經驗 - 小白

Microsoft Cognitive Service 提供了許多可以立即使用的 AI 功能，但是如何真的把已經有的工具變成真正的產品就是另外一個故事了，這次請到小白來分享 Cognitive Service 的人臉辨識之真正的實戰經驗而。

• Is that wine good or bad? A beginner tutorial on how to build a binary classification machine learning model with no code using Azure Machine Learning Visual Interface - Kristen Chan、Money Yu

In this workshop you will be introduced to the data science process for building custom machine learning models using Azure Machine Learning Visual Interface. We will cover how to find, import, and prepare data, selecting a machine learning algorithm, training and testing the model, and how to deploy a complete model to an API. Lastly we will discuss some common data science beginner gotchas and provide additional resources to continue your machine learning journey!

events.name: TWJUG 201909 聚會
events.description:
>https: //www.facebook.com/groups/185338705012/

贊助單位:
* 感謝 LINE 贊助本次活動的場地和食物！
* 感謝 JetBrains 贊助個人版授權一年份 x 1！

活動內容：

一、

主題: ZGC for Future LINE HBase

講者:Shinya Yoshida

Shinya Yoshida is a Serverside Engineer for LINE. He is working for Dev/Ops of HBase clusters for LINE Messaging Service. He was contributed to OpenJDK Projects like Lambda and Kulla, and is now a committer of OpenJDK and a board member of JJUG(Japan JUG).

簡介:

LINE Messaging service uses HBase as a persistent store, which is running on JVM. GC pause affects HBase response time and the service finally. We're using G1GC for our HBase, but we still have many 100+ ms pauses. And GC pause time will be a bottleneck of increasing JVM heap size to get the full-power of HBase because if we increase the heap size, the pause time is getting more longer.

At Java 11, they introduced extremely low pause time GC as an experimental feature, ZGC. We considered ZGC will free us from HBase GC pause issues and evaluated it with HBase in our test cluster.

I show the basis of GC and which part is different from other GCs and ZGC. I also share the points to choose GC and why we considered ZGC fits our HBase. And I show the evaluation results of ZGC with HBase. I also talk future plan to apply ZGC to our production environment.

二、

主題: Kafka Broker performance degradation by mysterious JVM pause

講者:Yuto Kawamura

Yuto Kawamura is a Senior Software Engineer at LINE.

He's leading a team providing company-wide Kafka platform and working for a lot of reliability/performance engineerings.
He's an Apache Kafka contributor, also he gave a lot of presentations in large conferences such as Kafka Summit 2017/2018, LINE DEVELOPER DAY 2018 and he loves visiting 九份.

簡介:

At LINE we are operating one of the largest scale Kafka cluster operated as a middleware infra for many services. Since it receives large scale traffic such that over 260 billion messages / day, we often meet a performance issue and try to deal with it. Recently we had an interesting case which makes Kafka broker to lowly perform due to insanely long JVM pause which wasn't caused by GC nor other typical causes. In this talk I'm gonna talk how did we investigated this issue diving beyond into the Linux kernel and finally solved it.

注意事項：

• 活動只需要在這邊或是 kktix.com 其中一邊報名就好，請勿兩邊報名喔:)

events.description:
(English below)
哈囉, 這個活動是由 #Topshelfgamesco 主辦的桌遊之夜,

TOP SHELF GAMES是一個由美國桌遊設計師所開設的桌遊公司, 致力推廣大眾桌遊的樂趣~~^^

他們的活動通常都是由''老闆''用英文與中文帶講解, 而參加的人也是聯合國喔~~歡迎對''桌遊''或是''語言交換''
或''交朋友''有興趣的人一起來參加活動吧!!

另外, 當天中央公園也陪你們一起玩到 23:00喔~~

活動費用: 每人低消飲料 $150元起 (不另外收場地或其他費用)

活動流程:
19:30-20:00 先吃飯,點杯啤酒暖身醒腦

Hey guys. Not sure what to do during the weekdays? Come join us for an event at Central Park cafe. Central park is a cozy FRIENDS themed coffee shop that does it absolutely right. If you're a fan of the TV you can't miss this one. Who wouldn't want to game on the set of FRIENDS?!
We'll be bringing some of our casual games over to play, enjoy a few beers, and mingle.

>https: //www.facebook.com/centralparkatTaipei/

Cost:150 bar minimum charge ( Drink only, food is not included.)

If you have any requests for games feel free to let me know and I'll do my best to bring them! Also we encourage others to bring and share your own games.

19:30 ~20:00 Have a beer/coffee and warm up
20:00 ~23:00 Game time

*****Disclaimer*****

When attending this event organizers reserve the right to refuse service to anyone for any reason and to take and use photos for an unlimited period of time. No one may use the photos taken by Top Shelf Games Co for any business related reasons. Only organizers have the right to cancel or adjust this event in any way.

group.name: Active Globals 國際 朋友

events.name: 【板橋/八月】WordPress #歡迎你來聚

venue.name: 松果小食
venue.address_1: 新北市板橋區民生路三段66號
venue.address_2: NO.66,Min-Sheng Road, Sec.3, Banqiao District, New Taipei City

events.description:
【板橋/八月】WordPress #歡迎你來聚

八月份板橋小聚來囉，連續兩個月有 31 天的八月，我們又有多一天的選擇可以辦小聚了！8/29（四）晚上 #歡迎你來 板橋聊聊你的網站，聊聊你最近的專案，聊聊你最近身邊發生的大小事，跟 WordPress 社群的大家一起交流、學習與成長吧！

每月板橋小聚都有一個預設的分享討論主題，希望當月大家可以聚焦在這個主題領域內提供想法分享、實作演練、互動交流...等。當然整體的交流並不限於這個主題，只要與 WordPress 相關的各項主題，還是都歡迎你一起來與社群一起分享。

本月份的主題是「生產力」，在開發或設計 WordPress 網站的工作過程中，我們都希望能夠透過許多想法整理、或是方便好用的小工具，來提昇我們的工作效率。你有哪些有關提升網站日常工作的生產力工具或是方法想要分享給大家呢？如果你願意提供 20-30 分鐘左右的主題分享，歡迎你來報名本次的小講，作為小講講師可以減免參加本次小聚的個人場地費喔！

另外，隨機閃電講也歡迎報名！想要分享最近發現的小點子、想要秀一下你的網站，都歡迎來報名喔！

時間：8/29 (四)[masked]
地點：板橋 / 松果小食 (新北市板橋區民生路三段66號，近捷運新埔站5號出口）
活動費用：0元
場地費用：入場費150元【紅茶無限暢飲，餐點九折】
人數上限：40人，額滿恕無法入場喔

小講#1 提升工作效率的 markdown 高速書寫術 by 一人 Hitori
小講#2 使用 vagrant 快速架 WordPress by ChrisLin [masked]更新)

#座位有限，請有報名的朋友不要缺席，無法出席者請確實取消報名
#現場有投影機可以使用，想要跟大家分享你的 WordPress 學習使用心得歡迎報名閃電講~

events.name: Tai Chi in Daan Park(English/Chinese)中英雙語教學

group.name: Learn Tai Chi in Taiwan (中英語教學)

events.description:
Take a break from your day-to-day life by doing something different and come join us in Daan Park to practice Tai Chi!

Tai Chi, short for Tai Chi Quan(太極拳), is a martial art that was originated centuries ago in China. It is characterized by a series of continuous, circular, slow, relaxed and smooth flowing movements that take nature as a source of inspiration.

It has been proved by numerous studies that the continuous practice of this martial art has several mental and physical benefits, from reducing stress, improving sleep quality and helping to boost cognitive function, to promoting weight loss, improving balance, strengthening muscles, therefore, reducing tension exerted on the joints amongst others.

If you wish to reap any of these benefits or are simply interested in the art of Tai Chi, you are welcome to join our classes!

About the class:
We focus on a more personal approach and we do so by having classes with a small number of people. This allows the master to give more of his attention to each individual student.
Our classes focus on both the physical part of Tai Chi as well as the principles that guide it.
The classes will be conducted in English and Chinese.

Class Fee:
200NT per individual class or 500NT for 3 classes
First comers get a 50% discount making it 100NT
Please pay your fees before the class, thanks.

Meeting Location:
We'll meet at 10:30 am at Daan Park MRT Station Exit 5. Don't forget to RSVP so we can know who to count on and wait for.
If you happen to run late, you can still join us. Just contact one of the organizers and he/she will pick you up.

Please wear long sports pants to practice Taichi, thanks.
If it rains, we will show you a safe shelter to do taichi.
Free Tai Chi Martial arts clothes for you guys to take pictures in August.

About the teacher:
Master Wu has been learning Tai Chi for more than 10 years now, including 2 years spent in Mainland China for that purpose. He is now back in Taiwan and wishes to share the art of Tai Chi with all those who are interested, foreigners or locals
